---
title: "Simple Regression"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment = NULL)
library(car)
library(arm)
```

```{r}
learn <- read.csv("data/learn.csv", header = TRUE)
```


```{r}
print(learn, row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
mod <- lm(Y ~ X, data = learn)
display(mod)
anova(mod)
```


```{r}
plot(Y ~ X, learn)
abline(coef(mod))
```
